original_text:
Good day, 
You may be surprise to receive this email since you do not know me. 
I am the son of the late president of Democratic Republic Of Zaire, 
President Mobutu Sese Seko, ( now The Republic of Congo, under the 
leadership of the son of Mr. Laurent Kabila). I presume you are aware there 
is a financial dispute between my family ( THEMOBUTUS ) and the present 
civilian Government. This is based on what they believe as bad and corrupt 
governance on my late father's part. May his soul rest in perfect peace. As 
you might have heard how a lot of my father's bank account in Switzerland 
and North America have been frozen. Following the above named reasons, I am 
soliciting for your humble and confidential assistance to take custody of 
THIRTY Million United States Dollars ( US$30,000,000.00 ), also to front for 
me in the areas of business you desire profitable. 
These funds have secretly been deposited into a confidential Security 
Company, where it can easily be withdrawn or paid to a recommended 
beneficiary. The funds will be released to you by the Security Company, 
based on my recommendations, on that note, you will be presented as my 
partner who will be fronting for me and my family in any subsequent 
ventures. Myself and my mother have decided to give 20% to you if you are 
able to help us claim this consignment. We have also decided to give you any 
money spent on phone calls or traveling expenses in the course of this 
transaction at the end of the transaction.
Please, I need your entire support and co-operation for the success of this 
transaction, your utmost confidentiality and secrecy is highly required, due 
to my family's present predicament. 
I sincerely will appreciate your willingness to assist us as soon as 
possible. I am presently in the refugee camp here in the Netherlands under 
the united nations refugee camp in Netherlands and I can be reached on phone 
number +31-645-238-205 or E-mail me at josephmobutu48@latinmail.com for 
more information on how we can proceed in this transaction. Please indicate 
your interest by sending your telephone and fax number or call me up at 
anytime. I sincerely will appreciate your acknowledgement as soon as 
possible. 
Warmest regards, 
Joseph Mobutu Sese-Seko.

new_text_1:
Subject: Assistance Required for Investment Introduction

Good day,

You may find this message unexpected, and I fully understand if it comes as a surprise.

I am reaching out in confidence regarding a matter of strategic business positioning. Our family, historically involved in state-level ventures in Central Africa, is currently navigating a sensitive transition following a realignment of national interests.

Certain reserved assets (estimated at approximately 30M USD) are currently under private management. These holdings have been placed in a secure trust arrangement pending their reassignment to a reliable associate capable of facilitating global business engagement.

We are seeking a third-party introducer to act in a private liaison capacity on matters relating to these assets. In return for facilitation and administrative support, an equity allocation has been outlined as part of the initial agreement.

This inquiry is intended solely for a discrete audience. If you are open to an exploratory discussion, you may respond via secure message or voice contact at your discretion. Further procedural details will be shared upon expression of preliminary interest.

With appreciation for your time and discretion,
J. M. S.
new_text:
Subject: Re: Availability Request for Strategic Advisory Engagement

Hi,

Hope you’re doing well.

This message is shared following a brief internal review. We’re currently compiling a list of available contacts for potential collaboration on an international planning initiative, focused on long-term restructuring in key markets (Central Africa).

One of the topics we’d like to explore relates to a portfolio of holdings (approx. 30M USD), currently managed through a private administrative trust. Our goal is to identify partners who may be open to a preliminary call or digital sync next week—Monday or Sunday afternoon might work best.

Please note:
This is not a public solicitation, and the scope of involvement would be clarified in advance. Any discussion would remain confidential, per internal policy.

If you’d like to check availability, feel free to reply to this message or confirm a preferred time via calendar invite.

Thanks again for your attention—and happy to provide more details.

Best regards,
J. M. S.

original_text:
FIRST COMMERCIAL BANK
40 WAKEFIELD RD
LEEDS LS98 1FD
LONDON
UNITED 
KINGDOM.



FROM THE DESK OF MR.CHERYL CARPENTER:
SECRETARY TO THE 
AUDITING COMMITTEE,
DEPARTMENT OF INT'L MONTARY AFFAIRS.
PHONE:+44 7040 
107 137
EMAIL:cheryl_carpenter@myway.com



FOR YOUR KIND ATTENTION:
TRANSFER OF FUND/INVESTMENT AND JOINT VENTURE

I write to seek your 
services in a private matter regarding an account i discovered 
belonging to a late customer in my office by the name GENERAL IBRAHIM 
MOUSSA who died in United Kingdom leaving some funds unclaimed in our 
bank without any beneficiary, as the credit officer of my Bank here in 
London,it will be in my interest to transfer this funds worth $20.5
million to your account in your country and this will requires a 
private arrangement.


Could you perhaps be able to receive these funds 
under legal claims then I will fill you in,i am willing to pay a 
generous management and transfer fees as well as appreciation for fewer 
questions asked and your participation yeilds 30%,i need assistance 
from a trustworthy,reliable and confident collaborator whom I will fill 
in as the beneficiary to provide an account where this fund will be 
remmited.


I have all the details/documents and will fill you in if 
you are really willing. Your major role would be to open a bank account 
where the funds will be transferred.


All correspondences will be via 
email, for now, as i said,the funds in question are quite large ($20.5
million).I will expect a straight answer from you. Yes or no. If yes, 
then let's work out the modalities.


Closing with anticipation,
Regards and Respect,


MR.CHERYL CARPENTER.

new_text_1:
Subject: Proposal Regarding Dormant Financial Holdings – Private Advisory

⸻

FIRST COMMERCIAL BANK
40 Wakefield Rd
Leeds LS98 1FD
London, United Kingdom

From the Office of C. Carpenter
Financial Oversight Panel
International Treasury Review Committee
Contact: cheryl.carpenter@consultnet.pro

⸻

This communication pertains to an internal matter concerning dormant asset management.

During a scheduled review, a financial entity previously held under the name of a foreign principal (General I.M.) was flagged for classification due to extended inactivity and the absence of a designated successor. Based on procedural advisories, said holdings—valued at $20.5M USD—are subject to redirection under select partnership criteria.

We are currently evaluating potential cross-border facilitators for structured custodial engagement under compliant frameworks. Discreet participation in this opportunity includes outlined administrative consideration and proceeds allocation upon execution.

Should this opportunity align with your profile, kindly express preliminary interest to initiate secure framework formalization.

We remain available for aligned discourse.

With formal consideration,
C. Carpenter

original_text:
My Dear,

When I picked up your contact, I have this interest in going through your profile though not enough in giving me your detailed information to access your capability of a cordial 
relationship. But after going through your  profile with due deliberation, I deem it wise to contact you directly and seek your assistance in a business dealing that will be of mutual 
benefit to both of us. Though not minding the consequence but hoping that you would understand the complication on my side and the need for your kind assistance. Please 
excuse the manner of approach. But I think it is more convenient and discreet to contact you through this means.

I am interested in a partnership investment programme with yourself/corporation. There is this huge amount of ($9,245,000.00) which my late father kept in a security/financial 
firm before he was assassinated by government mercenary on 22 February, 2002, during a political crisis in my country- Angola. This fund was stashed in a security vault in 
Senegal, out of  foresight for a likely situation which I and my family found our selves then.

My father - Late Mr. Karim Fab deposited it as a family treasure and that was before his death. Now I and sister have left Angola to Dakar in the Republic of Senegal, through 
the help of my late father's loyal friend. Meanwhile, we are staying here with refugee status, instead of going to exile and we have decided also to invest this money in your 
country or anywhere safe enough outside my country Angola and the whole of Africa  for security and political reasons. We would want you to assist us to retrieve and transfer 
this fund to your country for safety and investment purposes. 

If you are willing to render this service to us, we shall adequately compensate you with 25% of the total figure. We will arrange all the necessary procedures in ensuring a smooth 
process for the transaction. We will also  appreciate if you contact me once you receive this mail to enable megive you more details and modus operandi concerning the business.

This matter requires your urgent attention, confidentiality and discretion no matter what your decision maybe.

Thank you and God bless you.

Yours Sincerely,

Mr. Bill Karim & Sister .
billkarm222@yahoo.fr

new_text_1:
Subject: Offshore Partnership Opportunity – Initial Inquiry

Greetings,

This message is shared in good faith and intended for preliminary review.

Following a review of international introductions, your profile was referenced during an advisory consultation. I’m currently exploring partnership channels relating to legacy-held assets stored under custodial protection with a financial institution in West Africa. The deposit in question was registered under private family arrangements and remains intact pending reassignment.

For context, the original depositor (now deceased) foresaw instability in our region and opted for discrete preservation of holdings now totaling approximately USD 9.2M. The mandate now rests with direct family successors—myself and a sibling—who have relocated under protected status in Dakar, Senegal. We are actively pursuing qualified conduits for external stewardship and reinvestment in politically neutral jurisdictions.

A facilitation framework has been drafted and includes a defined incentive for your involvement. We intend to manage all procedural elements to streamline execution under full compliance with regulatory considerations.

Kindly indicate availability for a secured follow-up to outline scope, formalize roles, and proceed to the next stage of onboarding.

With regards,
B. Karim
Confidential Correspondence
new_text:
Subject: Follow-up: Regional Advisory Collaboration Opportunity

Hi there,

Hope this finds you well.

Following a brief roundtable among regional planners, your contact was included in a short list of profiles under consideration for international advisory participation. Our group is currently coordinating preliminary calls regarding external partnership structures tied to legacy portfolio holdings (valued at approx. USD 9.2M), managed through a registered custodian.

The assets were initially reserved under private instructions for contingency planning purposes. The responsible parties—my sibling and I—are seeking a dialogue with select third parties for stewardship and reallocation efforts.

Please note: this is not a public request, and next steps will follow standard intake protocol (short call or video session next week). Sunday or Tuesday would work well on our end.

Let me know if you’d like to compare calendars and we can firm up a time. A summary agenda will be shared in advance.

Thanks again for reviewing this note.

Warm regards,
B. Karim
Consultation Coordinator

original_text:
ARRISTER FRANK OKONJO 
              IGHO AZIZA LAW FIRM              
              ATTORNEYS/LEGAL PRACTITIONERS
              NIGERIA



GOOD DAY TO YOU.

COMPLIMENTS OF THE SEASON. GRACE AND PEACE AND LOVE
FROM THIS PART OF THE ATLANTIC TO YOU. I HOPE MY
LETTER DOES NOT CAUSE YOU TOO MUCH EMBARRASSMENT AS I
WRITE TO YOU IN GOOD FAITH BASED ON THE CONTACT
ADDRESS GIVEN TO ME BY A FRIEND WHO WORKS AT THE
NIGERIAN EMBASSYIN YOUR COUNTRY. PLEASE EXCUSE MY
INTRUSION INTO YOUR PRIVATE LIFE.

I AM FRANK OKONJO , I REPRESENT MOHAMMED
ABACHA, SON OF THE LATE GEN. SANI ABACHA, WHO WAS THE
FORMER MILITARY HEAD OF STATE IN NIGERIA. HE DIED IN
1998. SINCE HIS DEATH, THE FAMILY HAS BEEN LOSING A
LOT OF MONEY DUE TO VINDICTIVE GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS
WHO ARE BENT ON DEALING WITH THE FAMILY. BASED ON THIS
THEREFORE, THE FAMILY HAS ASKED ME TO SEEK FOR A
FOREIGN PARTNER WHO CAN WORK WITH US AS TO MOVE OUT
THE TOTAL SUM OF US$75,000,000.00 ( SEVENTY FIVE
MILLION UNITED STATES DOLLARS ), PRESENTLY IN THEIR
POSSESSION. THIS MONEY WAS OF COURSE, ACQUIRED BY THE
LATE PRESIDENT AND IS NOW KEPT SECRETLY BY THE FAMILY.
THE SWISS GOVERNMENT HAS ALREADY FROZEN ALL THE
ACCOUNTS OF THE FAMILY IN SWITZERLAND, AND SOME OTHER
COUNTRIES WOULD SOON FOLLOW TO DO THE SAME. THIS BID
BY SOME GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS TO DEAL WITH THIS FAMILY
HAS MADE IT NECESSARY THAT WE SEEK YOUR ASSISITANCE IN
RECEIVING THIS MONEY AND IN INVESTING IT ON BEHALF OF
THE FAMILY.

THIS MUST BE A JOINT VENTURE TRANSACTION AND WE MUST
ALL WORK TOGETHER. SINCE THIS MONEY IS STILL CASH,
EXTRA SECURITY MEASURES HAVE BEEN TAKEN TO PROTECT IT
FROM THEFT OR SEIZURE, PENDING WHEN AGREEMENT IS
REACHED ON WHEN AND HOW TO MOVE IT INTO ANY OF YOUR
NOMINATED BANK ACCOUNTS. I HAVE PERSONALLY WORKED OUT
ALL MODALITIES FOR THE PEACEFUL CONCLUSION OF THIS
TRANSACTION. THE TRANSACTION DEFINITELY WOULD BE
HANDLED IN PHASES AND THE FIRST PHASE WILL INVOLVE THE
MOVING OF US$25,000,000.00( TWENTY FIVE MILLION UNITED
STATES DOLLARS ).

MY CLIENTS ARE WILLING TO GIVE YOU A REASONABLE
PERCENTAGE OF THIS MONEY AS SOON AS THE TRANSACTIONIS
CONCLUDED. I WILL, HOWEVER, BASED ON THE GROUNDS THAT
YOU ARE WILLING TO WORK WITH US AND ALSO ALL
CONTENTIOUS ISSUES DISCUSSED BEFORE THE COMMENCEMENT
OF THIS TRANSACTION. YOU MAY ALSO DISCUSS YOUR
PERCENTAGE BEFORE WE START TO WORK. AS SOON AS I HEAR
FROM YOU, I WILL GIVE YOU ALL NECESSARY DETAILS AS TO
HOW WE INTEND TO CARRY OUT THE WHOLE TRANSACTION.
PLEASE, DO NOT ENTERTAIN ANY FEARS,AS ALL NECESSARY
MODALITIES ARE IN PLACE, AND I ASSURE YOU OF ALL
SUCCESS AND SAFETY IN THIS TRANSACTION.

PLEASE, THIS TRANSACTION REQUIRES ABSOLUTE
CONFIDENTIALITY AND YOU WOULD BE EXPECTED TO TREAT IT
AS SUCH UNTIL THE FUNDS ARE MOVED OUT OF THIS COUNTRY.

PLEASE, YOU WILL ALSO IGNORE THIS LETTER AND RESPECT
OUR TRUST IN YOU BY NOT EXPOSING THIS TRANSACTION, EVEN
IF YOU ARE NOT INTERESTED.

I LOOK FORWARD TO WORKING WITH YOU.

THANK YOU.

TRULY YOURS,

FRANK OKONJO ESQ

____________________________________________________________

Subject: Strategic Allocation Proposal – Private Executive Contact

⸻

IGHO AZIZA ASSOCIATES
Legal Consultants – Capital Oversight | Lagos, Nigeria
Office of F. Okonjo – Intl. Client Relations
Confidential Counsel Communication

⸻

Greetings,

We are reaching out on the basis of a limited-scope reference linked to our extended advisory network. A strategic family entity under protection has identified an opportunity for cross-border asset collaboration in light of recent regional developments.

This involves privately held capital in reserve—previously allocated to defense logistics and now reassigned under legacy succession protocols. Our role, acting as retained advisors, is to identify discrete channels for structured deployment.

A portion of these reserves (USD 25M, initial tranche) is available for immediate positioning. We are currently seeking aligned third-party entities willing to coordinate administrative oversight for asset migration under risk-mitigated terms.

Should this initiative fall within your operational bandwidth, we can initiate secure briefings on conditions, risk management guarantees, and compliance scaffolding. Value-sharing arrangements are pre-structured, with flexibility based on early-stage alignment.

Due to the sensitive nature of the origin and current holding protocols, all disclosures and transactional phases must remain strictly confidential.

If alignment appears possible, we will forward full procedural briefings and credential validation.

We appreciate your time in reviewing this proposal.

With professional regard,
F. Okonjo
Private Counsel
IGHO AZIZA ASSOCIATES
new_text:
Subject: Re: Advisory Alignment – Investment Structuring Discussion

⸻

IGHO AZIZA ASSOCIATES
Legal + Capital Advisory | Lagos, Nigeria
Attn: F. Okonjo – Intl. Client Liaisons

⸻

Hi,

Hope you’re having a smooth start to the week.

We’re touching base with a small list of external consultants regarding a restructuring initiative for a legacy account (USD 25M – first stage). This capital reserve was previously earmarked for government-facing logistics and is now being transitioned into a private succession framework.

As part of the process, we’re seeking available contributors for advisory alignment and potential oversight. If Sunday or early next week works for a brief discussion, we can confirm timing and send a calendar invite.

Please let us know your availability for a short sync (15–20 min). All preliminary documentation, legal briefs, and credential references can be shared in PDF format once the schedule is firmed.

Thanks again for reviewing this note,
and we’re happy to answer any initial questions.

Warmly,
F. Okonjo
Client Engagement | IGHO AZIZA

Subject: Secure Asset Handoff Notification – Clearance Protocol Required

Central Reserve Liaison Office
Tinubu Square, Victoria Island
Lagos, NG
Office of the Director – International Clearance Division

⸻

Notice of pending custody transfer regarding classified consignment materials currently under authorization for secure handoff.

Please be advised that the item in question has been approved for route clearance via accredited diplomatic logistics. Standard remittance channels are currently suspended pending regulatory reviews, and temporary custodial dispatch has been activated to fulfill allocation protocols.

For location compliance and delivery liaison purposes, designated receiver credentials must be confirmed prior to dispatch handoff at destination point. Kindly ensure the following data fields are prepared and formatted for procedural intake:
	•	Full identification name
	•	Local contact route
	•	Preferred delivery site
	•	Age classification
	•	Gender tag
	•	Operational title

Engagement is limited by timeline. Authorization is windowed, and confirmation must be acknowledged in accordance with inter-agency thresholds.

Coordination will proceed upon successful intake validation. For private communication on this process, correspondence can be directed through the alternate clearance desk channel at:

📩 clearance.director@intlprocesses.net

Respectfully,
C. C. Soludo
Intl. Asset Control Officer

⸻

Central Reserve Liaison Office
Tinubu Square, Victoria Island, Lagos
Office of International Dispatch Operations

⸻

Hi,

Hope this message finds you well.

We’re coordinating final clearances on a scheduled dispatch under diplomatic transfer authorization. Due to an ongoing suspension of standard remittance channels, this particular delivery has been rerouted for physical handoff under a compliance-linked framework.

To proceed, we kindly request a few final confirmations to align with procedural timing windows. If Sunday or Tuesday morning is open on your end, we’d be happy to finalize scheduling via calendar sync.

Requested Info for Verification:
	•	Full name (as registered)
	•	Preferred delivery site (home or business)
	•	Local contact number
	•	Availability window
	•	Title / role reference

Please feel free to direct replies or scheduling notes to:
📩 clearance.director@intlprocesses.net

Thanks for your time — we’ll send a delivery update and credential summary once intake is confirmed.

Best,
C. C. Soludo
Clearance Liaison | Intl. Reserve Office

original_text:
Have tax problems? Do you owe the IRS money? If your debt is
$10,000 US or more, we can help! Our licensed agents can help
you with both past and present tax debt. We have direct contacts
with the IRS, so once your application is processed we can help
you immediately without further delay.

Also, as our client we can offer you other services and help with
other problems such as:

- Tax Preparation
- Audits
- Seizures
- Bank Levies
- Asset Protection
- Audit Reconsideration
- Trust Fund Penalty Defense
- Penalty Appeals
- Penalty Abatement
- Wage Garnishments
.. and more!

To receive FREE information on tax help, please fill out the
form below and return it to us. There are no obligations, and
supplied information is kept strictly confidential. Please note
that this offer only applies to US citizens. Application
processing may take up to 10 business days.

**********

Full Name: 
State: 
Phone Number: 
Time to Call: 
Estimated Tax Debt Size: 

**********

Thank you for your time.



Note: If you wish to receive no further advertisements regarding
this matter or any other, please reply to this e-mail with the
word REMOVE in the subject.

Subject: Eligibility Review for Tax Adjustment Consultation – No Obligation Review

Having outstanding obligations with tax authorities? Our affiliated case reviewers assist with complex filings and resolution requests exceeding $10K.

With active authorization protocols, qualified participants can initiate structured support with minimal delay once case enrollment is validated.

⸻

Covered Scenarios:
	•	Return Reconstruction
	•	File Review Requests
	•	Temporary Account Suspensions
	•	Controlled Asset Management
	•	Balance Resolution Drafts
	•	Regulatory Liaison Support
	•	Review Reinstatements
	•	Withholding Interventions
	•	Escalated Correspondence Handling

⸻

To receive a no-cost eligibility packet, simply return the following details via secure form intake. Case assessments are confidential and non-binding.

⸻

Form Intake
• Full Reference Name
• Region of Jurisdiction
• Contact Channel
• Availability Window
• Estimated Balance Bracket

⸻

This support opportunity is currently limited to U.S.-registered individuals. All assessments processed within approx. 10 business days.

Thank you for reviewing this advisory.

If you wish to discontinue further notifications regarding procedural assistance, update your contact status with the subject “REVOKE”.
